project_overview: The project is a web-based dashboard for managing and monitoring local sentinel AI operations. The audit methodology involved static code analysis using predefined security guidelines.

items.description: The code includes a hardcoded AWS key which poses a significant security risk.
items.remediation: Replace the hardcoded AWS key with environment variables or secure vault storage.
items.how_to_fix: Update line 149 to use an environment variable for AWS keys.

items.issue: Potential SQL Injection via String Concatenation
items.description: The code uses string concatenation to build SQL queries without proper sanitization, which could be exploited for SQL injection.
items.remediation: Use parameterized queries or an ORM library to prevent SQL injection attacks.
items.how_to_fix: Refactor the query construction in line 206 to use a database library that supports parameterizing inputs.

items.description: The code uses HTTPS for all requests and includes a strict Content-Security-Policy to mitigate various web vulnerabilities.
